txt.en: 'There are some jewels of knowledge that surpass even the most brilliant gem or bauble. It is one such that I would have you compile for us here at Rivendell, that we might bring it before our brethren in the Uttermost West, that they might gain once more from the lands that they once called home.\n\n'Pen for me an essay entitled 'Of Mysteries Most Profound,' and your name shall be sung in the Last Homely House with reverence and gratitude.'

'Ah, let us see....

'Of Mysteries Most Profound' -- a title fitting for a study of one of the grand riddles of Middle-earth.

'Would that we had a hundred scholars such as yourself, [placeholder], though even then it seems that countless enigmas would remain before us.'
'Take your time with that paper, [placeholder]. A great deal of research and study must go into such a craft. Perhaps some travel in the wilds would help you clear your head?'
Cachúnir has expressed a desire to take as much history and lore of Middle-earth as possible when the Elves of Rivendell sail into the West.
Present 'Of Mysteries Most Profound' to Cachúnir in Rivendell
Cachúnir is at Rivendell, in the Trollshaws.\n\nCachúnir has asked you to pen an essay entitled 'Of Mysteries Most Profound' and bring it to him.
